column4: How do I run a .run script? Better yet, how do I reset my root password? :(
But may need to chmod +x file-to-run #First
you only have user password.  If you really need to login as root do  sudo su -
But ubuntu is designed in such a way that it is not really necessary.
thats good then! i was just asking
yes but not with the sudo command
it brings up a wide varity of commands ?
I suppose you will need to run this via sudo (at your own risk).
Yes, as fluvvell says, make sure you have correct driver software for your device.
